episodes.original_body:
Case: Corey-Todd-MVA-WC-8-2-2025
Client: Corey Todd

Corey, It's Justin from the Whaley Law Firm. Just wanted to confirm you have completed treatment. If so, I'll request your medical records/bills and start moving your file forward
episodes.natural_language:
Case: Corey-Todd-MVA-WC-8-2-2025. Client: Corey Todd.

On August 2, 2025, Justin from the Whaley Law Firm contacted Corey Todd to confirm whether he has completed treatment in connection with his motor vehicle accident and workers’ compensation matter. The message to Corey read: “Corey, It’s Justin from the Whaley Law Firm. Just wanted to confirm you have completed treatment. If so, I’ll request your medical records/bills and start moving your file forward.” The note indicates that if treatment has been completed, Justin intends to request Corey Todd’s medical records and bills and to begin moving the file forward.
episodes.author: Justin Chumbley
